rtega_mnemonic:
錢錢RS
钱钱		銭money, currency, coins
  • a small amount 戔/㦮 of gold or metal 金 serves as currency
  • metal 金 used to pay soldiers 戔/㦮
  • small 戋 metal 钅 coins are money
purpleculture_info:
(Simplified: 钱)
Pictophonetic: 戔 indicates the sound; 釒 (money) conveys the meaning.

    • 戔 [ jiān ] small, narrow; tiny, little
heisig_chinese_memo: Japan has the only coins in the world which can float (this is true by the way).  All the other countries gold sinks.
Ru_trainchinese:
qián: (сущ/сч.слово) монета; предмет в форме монеты; деньги; фонд, денежная сумма; богатство; мера веса, равная 5 граммам
qián: (сущ) Цянь (фамилия)
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: The Japanese have the only gold coins which can actually float.
origin_of_ch_char_book: Shellfish currency and a line (11th century – 10th century BC) (錢, 钱, qian=Ch’ien, money) The left means metal particles shining in the soil, and on the right there are metal spears stacked up. In old times, there was a thin coin that looked like a spear. People bundled up the spears like coins with a string. Now it means ‘money’.
humanum_full_description_en:
From the sound of " gold " and " pull ", the original meaning is farm tools, which resemble a shovel, and then often means currency. "Said Wen": "Cao Ye. Gutian ware. From gold, squeaking sound. "Poetry" says: "Yuan is money"." Cao Cao "Walk out of the summer gate-Winter October": "Qian 鏄 stopped, agricultural harvest Plot field."

" Money " often means currency. "Mandarin ‧ Zhou Yuxia": "In 21 years of King Jing, big money will be made." Wei Zhao's note: "The money is the name of gold coins, so trade and purchases are also used for wealth. The ancients are known as springs, and later they will be changed. money."

" Money " can be further extended to indicate expenses. "Water Margin" Chapter 20: "I'll make ten taels of silver with you again to use money."

" Money " can also mean things that are shaped like copper coins. For example, elm leaves are called elm money, small lotus leaves are called lotus money, and moss is called ground money and green money. Liang Shenyue of the Southern Dynasties "After the Winter Festival to the Prime Minister's first son's car": "The guest rank is full of green money, and the guest seat is born with purple moss."

" Money " is also used as a quantifier in modern Chinese to indicate a unit of weight in the municipal system, which is very equal to one coin, and ten coins equals one or two. Qing Gu Yanwu's "Rizhilu-Substitute Money for Baht": "The ancient algorithm is twenty-four baht for two...Modern mathematics is inconvenient, and it is very inconvenient, but the name is rich. This word is originally used to borrow money, not The rectification of several families."
humanum_short_description_en: From the sound of " gold " and " pull ", the original meaning is farm tools, which resemble a shovel, and then often means currency.
humanum_full_description:
從「金」，「戔」聲，本義為農具，形似鐵鏟，後常表示貨幣。《說文》：「銚也。古田器。从金，戔聲。《詩》曰：庤乃錢鎛。」曹操《步出夏門行‧冬十月》：「錢鏄停置，農收積場。」

　　「錢」後常表示貨幣。《國語‧周語下》：「景王二十一年，將鑄大錢。」韋昭注：「錢者，金幣之名，所以貿易買物，通財用者也。古曰泉，後轉曰錢。」

　　「錢」可進一步引申表示費用。《水滸傳》第20回：「我再與你銀子十兩，做使用錢。」

　　「錢」還可表示形狀像銅錢一樣的東西，如榆葉叫榆錢，小荷葉叫荷錢，苔蘚叫地錢、綠錢。南朝梁沈約〈冬節後至丞相第詣世子車中作〉：「賓階綠錢滿，客位紫苔生。」

　　「錢」在近現代漢語中亦用作量詞，表示市制重量單位，十分等於一錢，十錢等於一兩。清顧炎武《日知錄‧以錢代銖》：「古算法二十四銖為兩……近代算家不便，乃十分其兩，而有錢之名。此字本是借用錢幣之錢，非數家之正名。」
humanum_short_description: 從「金」，「戔」聲，本義為農具，形似鐵鏟，後常表示貨幣。

①貨幣：銅錢。金錢。銀錢。錢票。錢幣。錢財。錢莊。錢糧。

Chinese: Japan has the only coins in the world which can float (this is true by the way). All the other countries gold sinks.
Meaning: coin

Kind: traditional

從「 金 」，「 戔 」聲，本義為農具，形似鐵鏟，後常表示貨幣。《說文》：「銚也。古田器。从金，戔聲。《詩》曰：庤乃錢鎛。」曹操《步出夏門行‧冬十月》：「錢鏄停置，農收積場。」 「 錢 」後常表示貨幣。《國語‧周語下》：「景王二十一年，將鑄大錢。」韋昭注：「錢者，金幣之名，所以貿易買物，通財用者也。古曰泉，後轉曰錢。」 「 錢 」可進一步引申表示費用。《水滸傳》第20回：「我再與你銀子十兩，做使用錢。」 「 錢 」還可表示形狀像銅錢一樣的東西，如榆葉叫榆錢，小荷葉叫荷錢，苔蘚叫地錢、綠錢。南朝梁沈約〈冬節後至丞相第詣世子車中作〉：「賓階綠錢滿，客位紫苔生。」 「 錢 」在近現代漢語中亦用作量詞，表示市制重量單位，十分等於一錢，十錢等於一兩。清顧炎武《日知錄‧以錢代銖》：「古算法二十四銖為兩……近代算家不便，乃十分其兩，而有錢之名。此字本是借用錢幣之錢，非數家之正名。」

"Poetry" says: "Yuan is money"." Cao Cao "Walk out of the summer gate-Winter October": "Qian 鏄 stopped, agricultural harvest Plot field." " Money" often means currency. "Mandarin ‧ Zhou Yuxia": "In 21 years of King Jing, big money will be made." Wei Zhao's note: "The money is the name of gold coins, so trade and purchases are also used for wealth. The ancients are known as springs, and later they will be changed. money." " Money" can be further extended to indicate expenses. "Water Margin" Chapter 20: "I'll make ten taels of silver with you again to use money." " Money" can also mean things that are shaped like copper coins. For example, elm leaves are called elm money, small lotus leaves are called lotus money, and moss is called ground money and green money. Liang Shenyue of the Southern Dynasties "After the Winter Festival to the Prime Minister's first son's car": "The guest rank is full of green money, and the guest seat is born with purple moss." " Money" is also used as a quantifier in modern Chinese to indicate a unit of weight in the municipal system, which is very equal to one coin, and ten coins equals one or two. 錢字的基本解释

錢
qián
见“钱”。

錢字的汉语字典释义

[①]［qián］
［《廣韻》昨仙切，平仙，從。］
“钱1”的繁体字。亦作“銭1”。
(1)钱币。
(2)钱财；货币。
(3)费用；款子。
(4)形状像铜钱一样的东西。如榆叶叫榆钱，小荷叶叫荷钱，苔藓叫地钱、绿钱。
(5)指像铜钱一样的花纹。
(6)指连钱。马饰之一。
(7)纸钱。
(8)市制重量单位。十分等于一钱，十钱等于一两。
(9)姓。
[②]［jiǎn］
［《廣韻》即淺切，上獮，精。］
“钱2”的繁体字。亦作“銭2”。
古农具名。臿属，似今之铁铲。

錢字的康熙字典解释

【戌集上】【金字部】　錢； 康熙笔画：16； 页码：页1311第05
【唐韻】昨先切【集韻】財仙切【正韻】才先切，?音前。【玉篇】財也。【集韻】貨泉也。其藏曰泉，其行曰布。取其流行無不徧也。【正字通】冶銅爲錢，易貨也。古之爲市，所有易所無，布幣金刀龜貝之法窮，錢始行。周制以商通貨，太公望立九府圜法，錢外圓而內孔方，輕重以銖。圜者爲均通也。九府者，掌財帛之官也。歷代便之。周景王鑄大錢，曰寶貨，肉好有輪郭，以勸農贍不足，百姓蒙其利。錢形似璧，故亦稱肉好。或謂肉爲邊，不知錢邊曰郭，肉在邊之中也。漢以後，大小輕重不一，名稱各殊，國家攺元必更錢，以年號爲文，輪郭如舊。紀錢制者，唐張台封演有泉譜，陶岳有貨泉錄，宋洪遵有泉志，馬端臨有錢幣考，彼此異同，本註不具載。　又與泉同。【史記·天官書】下有積錢，金寶之上皆有氣，不可不察。【註】錢古作泉字。　又【朝野僉載】張鷟號靑錢學士，謂萬選萬中也。　又縣名。【前漢·地理志】會稽郡錢唐縣。【註】武林山，武林水所出。　又【後漢·梁冀傳】意錢之戲。【何承天·纂文】一曰詭億，一曰射意，一曰射數

錢字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
錢字的起名意思

暂无。

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［qián］
["Guangyun" yesterday, Xianxian cut, Pingxian, from. ]
Traditional characters for "钱1". Also known as "銭1".
(1) Coins.
(2) Money; currency.
(3) Expenses; money.
(4) Something shaped like a coin. For example, elm leaves are called elm money, small lotus leaves are called lotus money, and moss is called ground money and green money.
(5) Refers to the pattern like a copper coin.
(6) Refers to even money. One of the horse ornaments.
(7) Paper money.
(8) Municipal weight unit. Ten is equal to one coin, and ten is equal to one or two.
(9) Last name.
[②]［jiǎn］
["Guangyun" is shallow cut, top, fine. ]
Traditional characters for "钱2". Also known as "銭2".
Ancient farm tool names. The genus is like today's shovel.
money

[Su Ji 1] [Golden Word Department] 　 money; Kangxi strokes: 16; page number: page 1311 05
[Tang Yun] cut first yesterday [Ji Yun] Caixian cut [Zheng Yun] before cutting first, before the sound. 【Jade articles】Cai also. [Jiyun] The goods are also spring. Its storage is called spring, and its walking is called cloth. Whichever is popular is everywhere. 【Zhengzitong】Smelting copper is money and bartering. In ancient times, it is a city, all things are changed, and the method of cloth coin is poor, and money is the only way to go. The weekly system is based on commercial currency, and Taigong hopes to establish the Jiufu Won Method. The money is round outside and square inside, and the weight is in baht. Those who win are all connected. Those in the Nine Houses are the officials in charge of wealth and silk. It will be used throughout the ages. King Zhou Jing made a lot of money and said it was a treasure, and the meat was so good that there was a round of money to persuade the people to benefit from insufficient support for the farmers. Money looks like a bi, so it is also called good meat. In other words, meat is the side, Guo is not knowing the money, and the meat is in the side. After the Han Dynasty, the size was different, the name was different, the national yuan must be changed, and the reign was used as the text, and the wheel was the same as the old one. The writer of the chronology, Tang Zhangtai Fengxian has a music score, Tao Yue has a good spring record, Song Hongzun has a spring record, and Ma Duanlin has a coin test. The similarities and differences are not included in this note.　The same with the spring again. 【Historical Records·Book of Heavenly Officials】There is money in the bottom, and there is energy above the Jinbao, so you must not ignore it. 【Note】Qian Gu Zuoquan.　Also [Morning and Wilderness Contributions] Zhang Zhuo is a bachelor of Qianqian, which is called Wan Xuan Wan Zhong Ye.　Also the county name. [Former Han Geography] Qiantang County, Huiji County. [Note] Wulin Mountain, where the water comes out of Wulin.　[Later Han·Liang Ji Chuan] A play of money.
